definition: to press, i.e. to pierce, emasculate, handle

translations.bg: да притискам, т.е. да пробивам, кастрирам, обработвам
translations.da: at presse, dvs. at gennembore, kastrere, håndtere
translations.el: να πιέζεις, δηλαδή να τρυπάς, να ευνουχίζεις, να χειρίζεσαι
translations.es: presionar, es decir, perforar, castrar, manipular
translations.et: pressida, st. läbi lüüa, väljapressida, käsitseda
translations.id: untuk menekan, yaitu menusuk, mengebiri, menangani
translations.ja: を押す、つまり、突き刺す、萎ませる、扱う
translations.lt: spausti, t. y. pradurti, nužmoginti, tvarkyti
translations.nb: å presse, dvs. å gjennombore, kastrere, håndtere
translations.pt: pressionar, ou seja, furar, castrar, manipular
translations.ro: a apăsa, adică a străpunge, a emascula, a manipula
translations.sk: stlačiť, t. j. prepichnúť, vykastrovať, manipulovať
translations.tr: bastırmak, yani delmek, iğdiş etmek, ele almak
